title: Anyone who sends a SASE to a particular Colorado address can get...
content:
Anyone who sends a SASE to a particular Colorado address can get a teaspoon of sourdough starter that has been kept going continuously since 1847. Bonus: a website design that hasnâ€™t changed since 1996. (via buttondown.email)
